TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Help extends System.Object
public ref class Help abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Help extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装 HTML 帮助 1.0 引擎。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTML Help 1.0 engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能创建 类的新实例。You cannot create a new instance of the class. 若要为应用程序提供帮助，请调用静态 和 方法。To provide Help for an application, call the static and methods. 您可以使用 以 HTML 帮助格式显示编译的帮助文件（.chm）或 HTML 文件。You can use to show compiled Help files (.chm) or HTML files in the HTML Help format. 已编译的帮助文件在页面中提供目录、索引、搜索功能和关键字链接。Compiled Help files provide a table of contents, an index, search capability, and keyword links in pages. 快捷方式仅适用于已编译的帮助文件。Shortcuts work only in compiled Help files. 您可以使用 HTML 帮助讨论会生成 HTML Help 1.x 文件。You can generate HTML Help 1.x files by using HTML Help Workshop. 有关 HTML 帮助的详细信息，请参阅[MICROSOFT Html 帮助](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661)中的 "Html 帮助讨论会" 和其他 HTML 帮助主题。For more information about HTML Help, see "HTML Help Workshop" and other HTML Help topics at [Microsoft HTML Help](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含三个按钮，可用于与 Mspaint.exe 帮助文件交互。The following code example displays a form that contains three buttons that can be used to interact with the Mspaint.chm Help file. "**显示帮助索引**" 按钮显示帮助文件的 "**索引**" 选项卡。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. "**显示帮助**" 按钮根据在 "**帮助" 导航器**列表中选择的值显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. "**显示关键字**" 按钮根据在 "**关键字**" 文本框中指定的关键字显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，若要按索引值显示 "椭圆帮助" 页，请在 "**帮助导航器**" 下拉列表中选择 值，在 "**参数**" 文本框中键入 "**椭圆形**"，然后单击 "**显示帮助**" 按钮。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要通过关键字显示 "使用画笔绘制" 帮助主题，请在 "**关键字**" 文本框中键入**mspaint.exe：：/paint_brush** ，然后单击 "**显示关键字**" 按钮。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 该示例使用 方法来显示不同的帮助选项卡和帮助主题，并使用 方法来显示帮助索引。The example uses the method to display the different Help tabs and Help topics, and the method to display the Help index. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#1)]

span.span: Displays the contents of a Help file.

summary.span: 显示指定 URL 处的帮助文件内容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file at the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url` 参数的形式可以是*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 有关路径格式的信息，请参阅[Windows 系统上的文件路径格式](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `Button1`的按钮的窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 显示在指定 URL 处找到的有关特定关键字的帮助文件内容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file found at the specified URL for a specific keyword.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url` 参数的形式可以是*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 有关路径格式的信息，请参阅[Windows 系统上的文件路径格式](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats). 如果 `null``keyword`，则将显示帮助文件的目录。If `keyword` is `null`, the table of contents for the Help file will be displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了一个窗体，其中包含三个按钮，可用于与 mspaint.exe 帮助文件交互。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. "**显示帮助索引**" 按钮显示帮助文件的 "**索引**" 选项卡。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. "**显示帮助**" 按钮根据在 "**帮助" 导航器**列表中选择的值显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. "**显示关键字**" 按钮根据在 "**关键字**" 文本框中指定的关键字显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，若要按索引值显示 "椭圆帮助" 页，请在 "**帮助导航器**" 下拉列表中选择 值，在 "**参数**" 文本框中键入 "**椭圆形**"，然后单击 "**显示帮助**" 按钮。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要通过关键字显示 "使用画笔绘制" 帮助主题，请在 "**关键字**" 文本框中键入**mspaint.exe：：/paint_brush** ，然后单击 "**显示关键字**" 按钮。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此示例仅显示对 方法的调用。This example shows only the call to the method. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url` 参数的形式可以是*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 有关路径格式的信息，请参阅[Windows 系统上的文件路径格式](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats). 已编译的帮助文件提供了页面中的目录、索引、搜索和关键字链接。Compiled Help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 可以为 `navigator` 参数使用以下值： 、、或 。You can use the following values for the `navigator` argument: , , , or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将帮助文件打开到其索引页。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to open a Help file to its index page. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `Button2`的按钮的窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button2`. summary.span: 显示位于用户提供的 URL 处的帮助文件内容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file located at the URL supplied by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url` 参数的形式可以是*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 有关路径格式的信息，请参阅[Windows 系统上的文件路径格式](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](/dotnet/standard/io/file-path-formats). 已编译的帮助文件提供了页面中的目录、索引、搜索和关键字链接。Compiled Help files provide table-of-contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 您可以使用 `parameter` 参数来提供对 、、或 命令的其他优化。You can use the `parameter` argument to provide additional refinement of the , , , or command. 如果 `command` 参数中指定的值是 、或 ，则此值应为空字符串（"" 或 ）。If the value specified in the `command` argument is , , or , this value should be an empty string ("", or ). 如果 `command` 参数引用 、、或 ，此值应为包含主题名称的字符串，或者是要显示的主题的关键字或数字标识符。If the `command` argument references , , , or , this value should be a string that contains the topic name, or the keyword or numeric identifier of the topic to display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了一个窗体，其中包含三个按钮，可用于与 mspaint.exe 帮助文件交互。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. "**显示帮助索引**" 按钮显示帮助文件的 "**索引**" 选项卡。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. "**显示帮助**" 按钮根据在 "**帮助" 导航器**列表中选择的值显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. "**显示关键字**" 按钮根据在 "**关键字**" 文本框中指定的关键字显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，若要按索引值显示 "椭圆帮助" 页，请在 "**帮助导航器**" 下拉列表中选择 值，在 "**参数**" 文本框中键入 "**椭圆形**"，然后单击 "**显示帮助**" 按钮。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要通过关键字显示 "使用画笔绘制" 帮助主题，请在 "**关键字**" 文本框中键入**mspaint.exe：：/paint_brush** ，然后单击 "**显示关键字**" 按钮。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此示例仅显示对 方法的调用。This example shows only the call to the method. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#3)]

span.span: is an integer.

"**显示帮助索引**" 按钮显示帮助文件的 "**索引**" 选项卡。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. "**显示帮助**" 按钮根据在 "**帮助" 导航器**列表中选择的值显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. "**显示关键字**" 按钮根据在 "**关键字**" 文本框中指定的关键字显示帮助文件中的内容。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，若要按索引值显示 "椭圆帮助" 页，请在 "**帮助导航器**" 下拉列表中选择 值，在 "**参数**" 文本框中键入 "**椭圆形**"，然后单击 "**显示帮助**" 按钮。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要通过关键字显示 "使用画笔绘制" 帮助主题，请在 "**关键字**" 文本框中键入**mspaint.exe：：/paint_brush** ，然后单击 "**显示关键字**" 按钮。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此示例仅显示对 方法的调用。This example shows only the call to the method. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 显示一个“帮助”弹出窗口。

span.span: Displays a Help pop-up window.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用带有 类的 事件向用户显示弹出式样式帮助。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/VB/form1.vb#1)]
